trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings to <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece configurações de tema para objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class controls the look and feel of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> object on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe controla a aparência de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> objeto em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> to associate with the composite designer theme.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> a ser associado ao tema do designer de composição.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the end of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a forma que aparece no final de um conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the end of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> valor de enumeração que define a forma que aparece no final do conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.ArrowAnchor" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.ArrowAnchor" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> do conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object that contains information about the height and width of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> objeto que contém informações sobre a altura e largura do conector.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the beginning of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina a forma que aparece no início de um conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the beginning of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> valor de enumeração que define a forma que aparece no início do conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> do botão de expansão no designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object that contains information about the height and width of the expand button on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> objeto que contém informações sobre a altura e largura do botão de expansão no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the expand button on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites do botão de expansão no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um pincel que define as propriedades de exibição da tela de fundo do botão de expansão no designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" /> object that uses the <paramref name="rectangle" /> parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" /> que usa o parâmetro <paramref name="rectangle" /> para definir a área do botão na qual o pincel aplica duas cores em um gradiente linear do canto superior esquerdo para o canto inferior direito do botão de expansão.

trans-unit.source: If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush%2A> is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.
trans-unit.target: Se o pincel do plano de fundo para o botão de expansão não está definido como `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) antes de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush%2A> é chamado, descarta o método do pincel anterior e cria um novo.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de inicialização adicionais além das fornecidas pelo construtor <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> method obtains settings for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> object from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> está definida como `true`, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> método obtém configurações para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> objeto do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> que o tema de designer de composição agora deve usar.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> de que as configurações de propriedade do ambiente para o designer foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called it sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado, ele define o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> propriedades <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeração determina onde um tema designer obtém suas configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> valor estiver definido, a classe do designer de tema obtém suas configurações de ambiente do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> valor estiver definido, a classe do designer de tema obtém suas configurações de ambiente do sistema operacional em que o designer está instalado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the composite designer theme will display drop shadows around the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o tema de designer de composição exibirá sombras ao redor do designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> displays drop shadows around the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> exibe sombras em todo o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the watermark image in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento da imagem de marca-d'água no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> enumeration value that indicates where in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> the watermark image will be placed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> valor de enumeração que indica onde no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> a imagem de marca d'água será colocada.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment.BottomRight" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment.BottomRight" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem de marca-d'água a ser usada no designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> object to use as the watermark for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> objeto a ser usado como a marca d'água para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> é o valor da propriedade `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) dessa propriedade fornecerá a imagem para a marca d'água.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> propriedade é definida como um valor válido, essa propriedade é definida como `null` (`Nothing`).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative path to the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho relativo para a imagem de marca-d'água a ser usada no designer de atividade de composição.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the relative path to the watermark image to use on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa o caminho relativo para a imagem de marca d'água para usar no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> classe.
